data.title: Neil Patrick Harris' Harlem Brownstone — Calico Wallpaper
data.meta_description: Calico Wallpaper installed a feature wall in the master bedroom of Neil Patrick Harris and David Burtka.
data.text:
Recently married actors Neil Patrick Harris and David Burtka caused a stir with their record purchase of a four-story, 8,000 square foot Harlem townhouse, which they extensively renovated and redesigned. We were thrilled to contribute a custom Lunaris colorway to the project.

Working closely with interior designer Trace Lehnhoff, Calico Wallpaper installed a feature wall in the master bedroom, described by Architectural Digest as “a sumptuously refined refuge, with velvety upholstery, brass lamps, and a hypnotic expanse of marbleized wallpaper.”

It was a pleasure to work with Neil Patrick Harris and partner David Burtka, who were actively involved in the design process and have created a beautiful home.
